mapper.select: SELECT * FROM QNA_BOARD ORDER BY QNA_GROUP_NO DESC, QNA_GROUP_SEQ
UPDATE QNA_BOARD SET QNA_TITLE = #{QNA_TITLE}, QNA_CONTENT = #{QNA_CONTENT}, QNA_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE QNA_BOARD_NO = #{QNA_BOARD_NO}

UPDATE QNA_BOARD SET QNA_GROUP_SEQ = QNA_GROUP_SEQ + 1 WHERE QNA_GROUP_NO = (SELECT QNA_GROUP_NO FROM QNA_BOARD WHERE QNA_BOARD_NO = #{QNA_BOARD_NO}) AND QNA_GROUP_SEQ > (SELECT QNA_GROUP_SEQ FROM QNA_BOARD WHERE QNA_BOARD_NO = #{QNA_BOARD_NO})

INSERT INTO QNA_BOARD (QNA_BOARD_NO, QNA_GROUP_NO, QNA_GROUP_SEQ, QNA_TITLE_TAB, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_WRITER, QNA_DATE) VALUES(QNA_BOARD_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, (SELECT QNA_GROUP_NO FROM QNA_BOARD WHERE QNA_BOARD_NO = #{QNA_BOARD_NO}), (SELECT QNA_GROUP_SEQ FROM QNA_BOARD WHERE QNA_BOARD_NO = #{QNA_BOARD_NO}) + 1, (SELECT QNA_TITLE_TAB FROM QNA_BOARD WHERE QNA_BOARD_NO = #{QNA_BOARD_NO}) + 1, #{QNA_TITLE},#{QNA_CONTENT},#{QNA_WRITER},SYSDATE )
